title: Legal Billing Optimizer SaaS
description: Build a SaaS tool that helps law firms optimize their billing practices. Leverages Joe's 20+ years in elite billing software and data transformation for law firms. Could detect billing errors, suggest rate optimizations, compare against industry benchmarks, and flag compliance issues. Deep domain expertise = unfair competitive advantage in a high-value niche.

title: Signal App Premium Tier (Subscription Alerts)
description: The market-signal-lab already generates buy/sell signals with confidence scores via SMA Crossover, RSI Mean Reversion, and Donchian Breakout strategies. Package these as a subscription service delivering real-time alerts via email/SMS/push. CoinUsUp users could be the initial audience since they already track crypto. Start with crypto signals, expand to stocks.
revenueModel: Freemium: free daily summary, $9.99/mo for real-time alerts + paper trading

title: Automation Templates Marketplace
description: Package Joe's automation consulting knowledge into reusable templates and workflows sold as digital products. Could include: LaunchAgent templates, cron job configurations, data transformation scripts, Slack bot setups, monitoring dashboards. Low effort per unit ($10-50 each), infinite scalability. Use Gumroad or Lemon Squeezy for distribution. Each consulting engagement could generate a template as a byproduct.

title: Even Us Up: B2B Expense Splitting for Small Teams
description: Pivot Even Us Up from consumer expense sharing to also target small businesses â€” co-working spaces, consulting teams, shared offices, roommate houses with shared utilities. Premium features: receipt OCR scanning, tax categorization, QuickBooks/Wave integration, recurring splits, PDF export for accountants. B2B customers pay more and churn less than consumer users.
revenueModel: Freemium: free for personal, $4.99/mo per team for business features

title: Personal AI OS Platform (Alfred-as-a-Service)
description: Joe is building a sophisticated personal AI operating system (OpenClaw + Command Center + cron + notifications + multi-channel). This stack could be productized for other solopreneurs, consultants, and small business owners who want their own 'Alfred'. Sell the pickaxes during the gold rush. Could start as a self-hosted open-source project with paid managed hosting, or a SaaS with customizable AI agent templates.
revenueModel: SaaS ($29-99/mo) or managed hosting ($49-199/mo per instance)
